message.content:
I need to identify and extract the specific line items and value of income arising from the entity's core operating activities.

Looking at the income statement, the core operating activity of the business is represented by "Main Business Revenue," which shows the income generated from the company's primary operations.

From the table, I can see that "Main Business Revenue" has a value of 28572608.70 on 2024-02-05.

This represents the income arising from the entity's core operating activities.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '28572608.70'} }
```
